titleStmt.title: At a council held at Boston, January the 3rd. 1677. whereas the Holy God, who out of his tender mercy and bowels of compassion hath preserved this people, and these churches from the malice and rage of their enemies ...
titleStmt.author: Massachusetts. Council.

notesStmt.note: Signed: "By the council Edward Rawson, secr't."
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Massachusetts Historical Society Library.
